entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
